item.title: 3 charged with murder after 5-year-old killed in hyperbaric chamber explosion
item.description: The operator of the hyperbaric chamber also faces a charge of involuntary manslaughter, officials said.

item.title: Trump doubles tariffs on Canadian steel and aluminum; floats 51st state again
item.description: Trump adds another 25% to tariff on Canadian steel and aluminum.

item.title: US stocks drop amid fresh tariffs on Canada, recession fears
item.description: The selloff on Tuesday extended losses from a day earlier.
